title: How to Win Every Game on Madden 10

steps.headline: Go to a ranked game (beginners to this go to the beginners lobby)
Find a person with a low DNF (with this strategy, he could be a level 50 and you might beat him)
Pick the DALLAS COWBOYS (Tony Romo, Jason Witten, and Marion Barber are perfect for this strategy)
When on offense, you need to start with Marion Barber to the left of you and hot route him to the left with the left joystick to the left.
steps.description: Throw the pass 2 seconds after he cuts, assuming he's open.

steps.headline: Do the same this with Jason Witten, except hot route him out to the sideline with the right joystick right or left.
Once they stop the pass, which will be hard to do with this, run the HB Misdirection with Marion Barber.
Make sure you let the HB change direction and don't run to the side he initially cuts to when he start before Romo gives him the ball.

text: Get on Madden 10  Go to a ranked game (beginners to this go to the beginners lobby)  Find a person with a low DNF (with this strategy, he could be a level 50 and you might beat him)  Pick the DALLAS COWBOYS (Tony Romo, Jason Witten, and Marion Barber are perfect for this strategy)  Start the Game  When on offense, you need to start with Marion Barber to the left of you and hot route him to the left with the left joystick to the left. Throw the pass 2 seconds after he cuts, assuming he's open. Do the same this with Jason Witten, except hot route him out to the sideline with the right joystick right or left. Throw 2 seconds after he cuts. Once they stop the pass, which will be hard to do with this, run the HB Misdirection with Marion Barber.  Make sure you let the HB change direction and don't run to the side he initially cuts to when he start before Romo gives him the ball.
